stories.text:
Looking for "coffee table books" from which you can learn something by reading just a couple of pages, optionally with some imagery.

Something in the lines of: Thing Explainer by Randall Munroe (xkcd), The secret lives of color by Kassia St.Clair.
stories.title: Ask HN: What's your favorite coffee table book?

stories.text: Hello, my name is Andres Antonio, we are developing a PWA in Central America and we are looking for a developer with strong skills in the Angular language and wide and deep knowledge in CSS, JavaScript and HTML. The position is paid and requires commitment for at least 6 months, it is an advanced and high impact development, a perfect position for developers who want to change the world using code. Who wants to be part of a zero-to-one project with us? You can contact me at afandres1997@gmail.com.
